instructions: During a FaceTime call, tap the Effects button . (If you don t see the Effects button , tap the screen.) Tap the Animoji button , then choose an Animoji or Memoji (swipe through the characters at the bottom, then tap one). The other caller will hear what you say, but see your Animoji or Memoji doing the talking.

On supported models , during a FaceTime video call, tap the screen, then tap the Effects button . (If you don t see the Effects button , tap the screen.) Tap the Filters button to open the filters. Choose your appearance by tapping a filter at the bottom (swipe left or right to preview them).

During a call, tap the screen, then tap the Effects button . Tap the Text button , then tap a text label. To see more label options, swipe up from the top of the text window. While the label is selected, type the text you want to appear in the label, then tap away from it. Drag the label where you want to place it. To delete the label, tap it, then tap the Done Editing button .

During a call, tap the screen, tap the Effects button , then do any of the following: Tap the Stickers button to add a Memoji sticker or the Emoji Stickers button to add an Emoji sticker. Tap the Text button , swipe up, then tap the Emoji button . Tap a sticker to add it to the call. To see more options, swipe left or swipe up. Drag the sticker to place it where you want. To delete the sticker, tap it, then tap the Done Editing button .

During a call, tap the screen, then tap the Effects button . Tap the Shapes button , then tap a shape to add it to the call. To see more options, swipe up from the top of the shapes window. Drag the shape where you want to place it. To delete the shape, tap it, then tap the Done Editing button .
